propositions.text: The document is titled '女主现代重生--扭转乾坤之肥女翻身'.
The document consists of a series of numbered sections.
Each section has a title consisting of a number (e.g., '1641 1641').

concepts.name: 女主现代重生
concepts.context: Part of the main title of the document, indicating a modern rebirth of a female protagonist.

concepts.name: 扭转乾坤
concepts.context: Part of the main title, implying a significant change of fate or turning the tables.

concepts.name: 肥女翻身
concepts.context: Part of the main title, suggesting a story about a 'fat girl' making a comeback or undergoing a transformation.

concepts.name: section
concepts.context: Represents distinct parts of the document, each identified by a number and containing a date and placeholder text.

concepts.name: number
concepts.context: Used to label each section and also appears as placeholder data.

concepts.name: date
concepts.context: Consistently present in each section, showing '1900-01-01 00:00'.

concepts.name: placeholder text
concepts.context: Represented by 'xxxx' within each section, indicating unelaborated content.

hierarchy.structure: The document has a primary title followed by a series of numbered sections, each containing a date and placeholder text.
